column2: "Welcome back! Oh my, what do you have in that bag? Could it be...?"
"Oh, my goodness! You found all these for me? There's so many...!"

"At last, I have the mysterious button-shaped nuts...
They're round, cute and have a small hole on the back...
Hmm, they're supple yet solid."
"Yes, I think I can use them as buttons without making any alterations. How fascinating these nuts are."
"I will certainly give them a try later. Thank you for finding them for me! You did me a great favor!"
